subscription.banner_free_subtitle: Upgrade to remove ads and unlock premium features.

backup.banner_desc_premium: Export & share backups, and restore anytime.
backup.banner_desc_trial: Included in your trial ({{days}} days left).
backup.banner_desc_free: Upgrade to export & share backups and restore on a new device.
backup.restore_append_note: This will append your backup items to existing saved plans.

premium.plans_subtitle: Unlock the full potential of Indian Financial Calculator

insights.drawer_subtitle_benchmarks: Based on market benchmarks and your inputs ({{asOf}}).

settings.help_feedback_desc: Rate us, share feedback, or request features
settings.feedback_gate_hint: If something is wrong, tell us here — it helps us fix it faster. If you love the app, please rate us.
settings.rate_us_desc: Leave a review on the app store
settings.report_problem_desc: Email us details so we can fix it
settings.request_feature_desc: Share what you want to see next
settings.note_persist: Changes are saved automatically and will persist across app restarts.
settings.data_update_description: New language content or research data is available.
settings.remember_calc_description: Keep your last entered values when you come back to any calculator.
settings.remote_data_dev_desc: Enable this to test manifest/bundle downloads on web/emulator while running dev server.

research.title: Research & Methodology
research.description: Assumptions, sources and methodology used across calculators.

tax.title: Taxation
tax.empty_hint: Add your tax profile to see post-tax returns in calculators.
tax.enable_help: Applies to interest/coupons and capital gains across calculators.
tax.capital_gains_help: Used when a calculator models buy/sell or redemption gains.

onboarding.select_language_subtitle: You can change this later in Settings.
onboarding.profile_subtitle: We'll use this to personalize your experience. You can edit this later in Settings.
onboarding.profile_help: This information helps us personalize your financial journey.

deposits.title: Deposits
deposits.deduction_day_info: Leave blank to auto-use the acquisition date day.
deposits.track_interest_info: Recommendation: Avoid treating savings account interest as fixed monthly income — with slab-based rates that can change anytime and based on balances. Since balances are volatile with frequent cash flows, the actual interest varies.
deposits.monthly_estimate_info: Monthly income is estimated; actual crediting may vary.
deposits.pomis_tenure_info: POMIS tenure is 5 years. Maturity date is acquisition date + 60 months.
deposits.pomis_tenure_with_date: POMIS tenure is 5 years. Inferred maturity date: {{date}}
deposits.nsc_info: NSC is cumulative; interest is paid at maturity.
deposits.kvp_suggestion: Suggested: ~{{months}} months to double at current rate.
deposits.kvp_info: KVP is cumulative; interest is realized via maturity value. Choose a maturity date; tenure varies with notified interest rate.
deposits.interest_rate_optional: Interest rate optional if not tracking income.

vehicle_info.car: Assuming 12,000 km/year and no accident history for cars.
vehicle_info.two_wheeler: Assuming 6,000 km/year and no accident history for two-wheelers.
vehicle_info.commercial: Assuming 25,000 km/year and no accident history for commercial vehicles.

nps.tier_info: Add both Tier 1 and Tier 2 in one go. Each tier will be saved separately.
nps.expected_return_info: Suggested Expected CAGR for NPS: {{percent}}% (blended default). Tap magic to apply.
nps.annuity_purchase_info: Per PFRDA, minimum annuity purchase at exit is {{percent}}% of corpus. Early exit before age 60 typically requires 80% annuity.
nps.annuity_rate_info: Typical annuity rates are ~6%–8% p.a. Adjust based on the insurer/scheme you intend to select.

loan.took_loan: Did you take a loan for this asset?
loan.calculation_error: Calculated amount (from EMI, rate, term) cannot exceed Current outstanding.
loan.outstanding_error: Current outstanding cannot exceed the entered Loan amount.
loan.amount_error: Loan amount cannot exceed the Cost of Acquisition.

income.title: Add income
income.nudge_text: Want to track income against an asset?

payable.title: Add payable
payable.nudge_main: Want to track payments tied to a loan or credit line? Use the Add Liability flow instead.
payable.nudge_desc: Payables are best for standalone bills, subscriptions, taxes and fees that are not part of a liability.

liability.title: Add a liability
liability.asset_nudge: Want to track an asset with a linked loan?
liability.review_date_info: Used to remind you to renew OD/LOC with the bank; safe to leave blank.
liability.facility_info_text1: Line of Credit (LOC) and Overdraft (OD) are revolving facilities with a sanctioned limit. You draw, repay, and redraw within the limit. Interest is charged only on the utilized amount and usually debited monthly.
liability.facility_info_text2: • LOC: General-purpose revolving limit (secured or unsecured). Good for flexible cash flow.
liability.facility_info_text3: • Overdraft: Often linked to current/savings accounts; similar mechanics. Some products have interest-only servicing with flexible principal repayment.
liability.facility_info_text4: Pick either based on how your NBFC/bank labels the facility. This app tracks snapshot metrics like limit, outstanding, APR, utilization, and renewal reminders.

home.title: All Financial Tools
home.subtitle: Here's your financial snapshot
home.profile_reminder: Complete your profile to personalize your experience.

pins.hint: Long press to pin or unpin

fd.caption: POMIS, NSC, KVP, POTD, SCSS, FRB, PMVVY
fd.scheme_instruction: Select a scheme from the menu below easily switch between

scheme_notes.scss: Senior Citizen Savings Scheme. Quarterly payout; 5-year term.
scheme_notes.pomis: Post Office Monthly Income Scheme. Monthly payout; 5-year term.
scheme_notes.nsc: National Savings Certificate. Annual compounding; maturity at 5 years.
scheme_notes.kvp: Kisan Vikas Patra. Cumulative; doubles in notified period.
scheme_notes.potd: Post Office Term Deposit. Yearly compounding; select 1/2/3/5 years.
scheme_notes.frb: Floating rate: coupon = NSC rate + spread. Semi-annual payout; 7-year maturity. Rate resets periodically.
scheme_notes.pmvvy: Pradhan Mantri Vaya Vandana Yojana. 10-year annuity-style payout; select payout mode in UI.
scheme_notes.mssc: Mahila Samman Savings Certificate. 2-year term; quarterly compounding.

rd.caption: Post Office RD (5y)
rd.scheme_instruction: Use the Scheme menu to switch to

scheme_notes.post_office: Post Office RD. 5-year term, quarterly interest credit.
scheme_notes.custom: Customize your own rate and term.

apy.caption: APY, PM-SYM
apy.scheme_instruction: Choose a government pension scheme below

scheme_notes.apy: Atal Pension Yojana (APY). 25 years till pension start at age 60.
scheme_notes.pmsym: Pradhan Mantri Shram Yogi Maandhan (PM-SYM). For unorganized sector workers.

bond.caption: G-Secs, PSU, Corporate, AT-1, SGB
bond.category_instruction: Use the Category menu to switch to between

category_notes.gsec: Government Securities and State Development Loans. Typically 6-7% yield with semiannual payouts.
category_notes.taxfree_psu: Tax-Free PSU Bonds. Interest exempt from income tax. Typically 5.5-8.5% yield.
category_notes.corp_ig: Investment-Grade Corporate Bonds. Higher yield than G-Secs, typically 7-9%.
category_notes.ncd_hy: High-Yield Bonds and NCDs. Higher risk, higher return, typically 9-12%+.
category_notes.at1: AT-1 Perpetual Bonds. Bank-issued with call features, typically 8-8.5% yield.
category_notes.sgb: Sovereign Gold Bonds. Gold price-linked with 2.5% p.a. interest.

ssy.helper_notes: Notes: SSY contributions are monthly (flexible) and interest is credited annually at year-end. Long lock-in applies; this tool focuses on growth and maturity projection only.

save.validation_date_order: Maturity Date must be on or after Start Date
save.validation_min_maturity: Maturity Date must be on or after Start Date + Term − 1 day

common.long_press_to_multi_select: Long press an item to multi-select
common.schemes_search_placeholder: Search schemes by name or keywords...
common.subject: Subject
common.tools_search_placeholder: Search calculators by name or tags...
common.unavailable: This tool is not available in production builds.

interest_rates.title: Interest Rates
interest_rates.indicative_note: Rates are indicative market ranges as of Dec 2025. Actual rates offered may vary based on amount, tenure, and credit profile.

common.translation_incomplete: Translation for this page is not complete. Some content may appear in English.
common.saved_plans_helper: Calculations you save will appear here for easy access.

finance_hub.title: Finance Hub
finance_hub.knowledge_base_desc: Short, practical explainers to help you make better financial decisions.
finance_hub.fraud_playbook_desc: Immediate steps for fraud victims and Zero Liability rules
finance_hub.holiday_helper: Holidays can vary by state. Select a state to see the relevant bank holiday list.
finance_hub.schemes_browse_helper: Browse government-backed savings and pension schemes. Tap any scheme to view details and open the calculator when available.
finance_hub.schemes_desc: Explore government-backed savings and pension schemes
finance_hub.templates_desc: Draft formal requests for banking and financial services
finance_hub.template_helper: Select a template, fill in the details, and share it via Email or WhatsApp.
finance_hub.fraud_immediate_desc: If you have just noticed an unauthorized transaction, every minute counts. Follow these steps immediately.
finance_hub.fraud_step1_desc: Use your bank's mobile app or SMS codes to block Debit/Credit cards and Netbanking access immediately.
finance_hub.fraud_step2_desc: Call 1930 or log on to cybercrime.gov.in. Keep your transaction details (UTR/Ref No) ready.
finance_hub.fraud_step3_desc: Inform your bank's fraud department within 3 days. This is critical for RBI's 'Zero Liability' protection.
finance_hub.fraud_zero_liability_desc: If you report an unauthorized transaction within 3 working days, you have zero liability. The bank must credit the amount back within 10 days.
finance_hub.fraud_limited_liability_desc: If reported within 4-7 working days, your liability is limited (usually up to ₹5,000 to ₹25,000 depending on account type).
finance_hub.fraud_tip1: Enable SMS and Email alerts for all transactions.
finance_hub.fraud_tip2: Set transaction limits for online and international usage.
finance_hub.fraud_tip3: Never share OTP, PIN, or CVV with anyone calling as 'Bank Staff'.
finance_hub.know_your_rights_desc: Summaries of key RBI guidelines protecting you
finance_hub.rules_disclaimer: These summaries are for informational purposes based on research. For legal purposes, please refer to the official Master Directions on the RBI website.
finance_hub.kyc_header_note: Research-backed list of Officially Valid Documents (OVDs) as per RBI Master Directions.
finance_hub.kyc_important_note: Important: If your current address is different from Aadhaar, you can submit "Deemed OVDs" but must update Aadhaar within 3 months.
finance_hub.security_tips_header: How to stay safe from common digital banking scams and phishing attempts.
finance_hub.security_alert_desc: If you have clicked on a suspicious link or shared details, immediately block your cards and inform your bank using the official channels provided in the Finance Hub.
finance_hub.kyc_desc: List of officially valid documents for KYC
finance_hub.security_desc: Tips to protect against phishing and digital fraud
finance_hub.interest_rates_desc: Indicative FD, RD and Loan interest rates across major banks
finance_hub.kyc_nrega_desc: Duly signed by an officer of the State Government
finance_hub.kyc_utility_bills_desc: Electricity, Telephone, Post-paid mobile, Piped gas, Water bill (not older than 2 months)
finance_hub.kyc_ppo_desc: Pension or family pension payment orders issued by Govt
finance_hub.kyc_allotment_letter_desc: Accommodation from Central/State Govt, Statutory/Regulatory bodies
finance_hub.kyc_guardian_desc: OVDs of the parent/guardian are required

info.no_content_found: No content found for this scheme in docs.

save.validation_name_length: Name should be 50 characters or fewer.
save.validation_start_date_range: Start date must be within the last 20 years and next 5 years.
save.premium_feature_body_fallback: Save unlimited calculations and remove ads.
save.delete_confirm_msg: Are you sure you want to delete

post_save.title: Saved
post_save.message: Your plan is saved. Open My Plans?

common.export_timeout_tip: Reduce tenure (e.g., 40y) or export after submitting a smaller schedule.
common.open_failed: Could not open the PDF. Try Share.
common.premium_feature_body_free: You have {{remaining}} free tries left (out of {{total}}).
common.premium_feature_body_ad: You have used all {{total}} free tries. Watch an ad to continue.
common.save_feature_body: Calculations are saved securely on this device.
common.save_feature_body_ad: Watch a short ad to save this calculation locally.
common.save_feature_point_2: Data stays private on your phone
common.compare_feature_body_free: You have {{remaining}} free comparisons left (out of {{total}}).
common.compare_feature_body_ad: You have used all {{total}} free comparisons. Watch an ad to continue.
common.compare_feature_point_1: Compare up to 3 plans at a time
common.validation_rate: Enter a valid rate (up to 4 decimals)
common.cta_check_sip: FDs are safe, but inflation eats your value. Check our SIP calculator for higher returns.
common.no_data: No data available to plot yet.
common.nominal_value_context: Maturity amount in future rupees, without adjusting for inflation.

fd.payout_count_tooltip: Bank payout dates can vary by institution. Many private banks (e.g., HDFC, ICICI) calculate interest by anniversary cycles (for example, 20th → 20th). Some banks align payouts to month-end (30th/31st), in which case your first payout may include "broken-period" interest for the partial period (for example, Jan 20 → Jan 31) before regular payouts begin.
fd.title: Fixed Deposits
fd.custom_bank_fd: Custom Bank/Corporate FD. Set payout/tenure/rate as needed.
fd.note_pomis: Post Office Monthly Income Scheme. Monthly payout; principal at 5 years.
fd.note_cumulative: Monthly compounding assumed for cumulative FD
fd.payout_rate_hint: Tip: Use the bank’s payout rate for monthly/quarterly/yearly options. Reinvestment (cumulative) rates will differ.
fd.compounding_locked_hint: Compounding is preset by the selected scheme.
fd.anchor_note_month_start: First payout is prorated from start date to the 1st of next month.
fd.helper_notes: Notes: For payout FDs, interest is paid out periodically and principal is returned at maturity. For cumulative FDs, interest is compounded and paid at maturity. Inflation adjustment is shown only for maturity-only payouts.
fd.multiplier_copy: For every ₹1 you locked in, the bank added more by maturity. That is the advantage of fixed deposits.
fd.multiplier_title: The Multiplier Effect on your FD
fd.start_date_assumed_booking_note: Start date is assumed as the 1st of next month to align with typical bank FD booking and payout schedules.
fd.payout_start_date_autoset_note: Payout start date is auto-set to the 1st of next month to align with typical bank month-end payout schedules.
fd.validation_inflation_cap: Inflation cannot be more than 10%. Higher assumptions make long-term comparisons unstable.
fd.validation_principal_cap: Deposit amount cannot be more than ₹100 crores. Larger tickets are uncommon for retail FDs and can distort projections.
fd.validation_rate_cap: Annual interest rate cannot be more than 20%. Higher rates are rare for safe bank/corporate deposits.
fd.validation_term_cap: Term cannot be more than 25 years. Most FD products are much shorter and very long tenures become unrealistic.

rd.title: Recurring Deposits
rd.note_custom: Set your own rate and term.
rd.helper_notes: Notes: RD assumes monthly contributions. Post Office RD credits interest quarterly. In India, most banks usually compound/credit RD interest quarterly. Growth view shows deposits each month and interest credited at the appropriate cadence.
rd.multiplier_copy: For every ₹1 you deposited, the bank added more in interest. That is the power of disciplined recurring saving.
rd.multiplier_title: The Multiplier Effect on your RD
rd.validation_deposit_cap: Monthly deposit cannot be more than ₹1 crore. Such large recurring deposits are uncommon for retail RDs.
rd.validation_rate_cap: Annual interest rate cannot be more than 20%. Higher rates are rare for safe recurring deposits.
rd.validation_target_cap: Target maturity cannot be more than ₹100 crores. Extremely large targets can make RD projections misleading.
rd.validation_term_cap: Term cannot be more than 25 years. Very long RD tenures are unrealistic in practice.

sip.xirr_tooltip: XIRR is the annualized return of your actual cashflows (many SIP payments + final maturity). It can differ slightly from the assumed return due to contribution timing and step-ups.
sip.adv_subtitle: These options fine-tune how calculations are performed.
sip.adv_hint_annuity: If on, each contribution starts earning immediately.
sip.adv_hint_stepup: Linear: base × (1 + n×%). Off: compounded per event.
sip.adv_hint_rate: If on, monthly rate = (1+EAR)^(1/12) - 1. If off, APR/12.
sip.adv_annuity_due: Contribute at start of period (Annuity Due)
sip.adv_stepup_linear: Percent step-up is linear on base (not compounded)
sip.adv_rate_effective: Interpret annual rate as Effective Annual (EAR)
sip.inflation_hint: Enable to see purchasing power after inflation.
sip.disclaimer: Returns shown are hypothetical and subject to market conditions.
sip.add_sip_day_tip: Add SIP day for better tracking
sip.chart_cost_of_delay_caption: Delaying your SIP by 5 years reduces your final corpus dramatically. The gap below shows how much wealth you leave on the table.
sip.chart_power_of_compounding_caption: In the early years most of the value is what you invest. After year 8–10, the interest portion starts to dominate and the curve bends upwards.
sip.lumpsum_cap_toast: Each lump sum cannot exceed ₹10 crore.
sip.lumpsum_month_term_helper: Month cannot be greater than the investment term.
sip.lumpsum_month_term_toast: Lump sum month cannot be greater than the investment term.

swp.title: Systematic Withdrawal Plan
swp.chart_breakeven_message_hit: By year {{year}}, you have withdrawn your entire initial capital. Anything left after that is pure profit.
swp.chart_breakeven_message_not_hit: Within this term, you do not fully withdraw your initial capital.
swp.chart_sustainability_message_depleted: At this withdrawal rate, your funds run out around year {{year}}.
swp.chart_sustainability_message_safe: At this withdrawal rate, your capital stays intact for the full term.
swp.withdrawal_gt_corpus_helper: Withdrawal cannot be greater than initial corpus.
swp.stepup_amount_gt_corpus_helper: Change amount cannot be greater than initial corpus.
swp.one_time_month_term_helper: Month cannot be greater than the selected term.
swp.one_time_amount_cap_helper: Amount cannot be greater than initial corpus or ₹100 crore.
swp.one_time_fix_errors_toast: Fix errors in one-time withdrawals before saving.

ppf.title: Public Provident Fund
ppf.validation_annual_min: PPF allows a minimum contribution of ₹500 per financial year (including top-up).
ppf.validation_annual_max: PPF allows a maximum contribution of ₹1,50,000 per financial year (including top-up).
ppf.validation_term_min: Minimum PPF lock-in period is 15 years.
ppf.validation_term_block: PPF extensions must be in blocks of 5 years (15, 20, 25, 30...).
ppf.helper_notes: Notes: PPF allows flexible contributions during the year; interest is credited annually. This tool shows projected maturity and growth. Tenure default is 15 years.
ppf.inflation_chart_caption: The blue bar shows what your maturity is worth in today's money.
ppf.inflation_chart_hint: Turn ON inflation to see its impact on your maturity.
ppf.multiplier_copy: For every ₹1 you saved, the Govt added ₹2. That is the power of tax-free compounding!
ppf.multiplier_title: The Multiplier Effect on your savings
ppf.multiplier_x_label: Approx. x{{x}} multiplier on your savings

bond.title: Bonds
bond.helper_notes: Price is present value of coupons and redemption discounted at the yield. Semi-annual/quarterly compounds adjust coupon and discounting accordingly.
bond.solve_question: What do you want to find?
bond.helper_enter_ytm: Enter YTM to compute bond price.
bond.helper_clean_dirty: Dirty price = Clean price + Accrued interest. If your quote excludes accrued interest, choose Clean.
bond.helper_dirty_no_extra: Dirty price already includes accrued interest. No extra inputs needed.
bond.accrued_interest_help: Accrued interest is the coupon earned since the last coupon date.
bond.error_settlement_before_last_coupon: Settlement date cannot be before last coupon date.
bond.chart_income_caption: Annual cashflows (coupons + redemption) over bond life

pdf.rewarded_promo_body: Scan the QR code or visit the link below to download the app.

nps.title: National Pension Scheme
nps.helper_small_corpus_applied: Small-corpus exemption applied (≤ {{amount}}). Minimum annuity not required.
nps.adv_stepup_employer: Apply annual step-up to employer contribution
nps.info_expected_return: Expected Return is a long-term blended assumption based on your chosen profile and historical NPS ranges. You can adjust it anytime. The magic icon resets to the default (10%).
nps.helper_rules: Notes: NPS Tier I follows PFRDA rules. Minimum annuity purchase applies at retirement (e.g., 40% at 60). Small-corpus exemption allows full withdrawal if corpus is under the threshold.
nps.error_age_order: Retirement age must be greater than current age.
nps.suggested_default: Suggested: {{percent}}% p.a. (blended default). Tap magic to apply.
nps.chart_power_caption: Employee + Employer + Top-up vs Interest over time
nps.entry_age_error: Entry age must be between 18 and 70 years.
nps.helper_intermediate_slab: Corpus is in ₹8L–₹12L slab: ₹6L lump sum, remaining for annuity/withdrawal.
nps.premature_min_years_error: Premature exit (before 60) requires at least 5 years in the scheme.
nps.retire_age_max_error: Retirement age cannot be more than 75 years.

epf.title: Employees Provident Fund
epf.helper_notes: Notes: EPF contributions include Employee, VPF and Employer (EPF/EPS). EPS goes to pension and does not form part of the EPF corpus. Interest is credited annually; this tool approximates monthly accrual with year-end credit.
epf.error_basic_invalid: Enter a valid Basic + DA amount.
epf.error_basic_cap: Basic + DA cannot be greater than ₹10 crore.
epf.error_initial_epf_invalid: Enter a valid Initial EPF Balance.
epf.error_initial_epf_cap: Initial EPF Balance cannot be greater than ₹10 crore.
epf.error_initial_eps_invalid: Enter a valid Initial EPS Balance.
epf.error_initial_eps_cap: Initial EPS Balance cannot be greater than ₹100 crore.
epf.error_term_cap: Term cannot be more than 70 years.
epf.error_salary_increase_invalid: Enter a valid expected salary increase.
epf.error_salary_increase_cap: Expected salary increase cannot be more than 10000%.
epf.error_emp_pct_cap: Employee EPF (%) cannot be more than 100%.
epf.error_er_epf_pct_cap: Employer EPF (%) cannot be more than 100%.
epf.error_eps_pct_cap: Employer EPS (%) cannot be more than 100%.
epf.error_eps_ceiling_invalid: Enter a valid EPS wage ceiling.
epf.error_eps_ceiling_cap: EPS wage ceiling cannot be greater than ₹1 lakh.
epf.error_interest_invalid: Enter a valid EPF interest rate.
epf.error_interest_cap: EPF interest rate cannot be more than 25%.
epf.error_inflation_cap: Inflation rate cannot be more than 10%.
epf.summary_er_eps: Employer to EPS (not in EPF corpus)

apy.title: Govt Pension Schemes
apy.info_text: APY tables are defined by PFRDA. We look up the nearest entry-age row for the selected pension slab. Actual official table is discrete by age; for precise values, refer to your bank’s APY matrix.
apy.error_age_range: Entry age must be between {{min}} and {{max}} years.

scss.title: Senior Citizen Savings Scheme
scss.info_text: SCSS pays interest quarterly at the notified rate. This tool estimates quarterly payout as principal × annual rate / 4. Monthly income is a rough guide (principal × annual rate / 12) for planning only.

ssy.title: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana
ssy.annual_cap_error: Maximum per year: You cannot deposit more than ₹1.5 Lakh in a financial year. Any amount over this will be returned without interest.
ssy.timeline_helper_invalid: Account timeline: Deposits allowed for the first 15 years. Growth-only period: years 16–21 (no deposits). Maturity: end of year 21.
ssy.timeline_helper: Account timeline: Deposits allowed for the first {{depositYears}} years. Growth-only period: years {{growthFromYear}}–{{maturityYear}} (no deposits). Maturity: end of year {{maturityYear}}.
ssy.lockin_helper_main: Lock-in: Partial withdrawal is allowed when she turns 18 (subject to rules). Maturity is at 21 years from opening.
ssy.lockin_helper_early: Opening earlier means a longer lock-in, but also more years for compounding before she turns 18.
ssy.lockin_helper_edge: Because you are opening around age 10, the lock-in is only about 8 years until she turns 18.
ssy.lockin_helper_error: You can open an SSY account only up to 10 years of age.
ssy.info_calculated_fields_desc: Total Interest and Total at Maturity.

si.title: Simple Interest
si.info_inputs_desc: Principal Amount, Annual Interest Rate, Term (Years/Months/Days)
si.info_calculated_fields_desc: Total Interest and Total Amount (Principal + Interest).

currency.search_placeholder: Search by currency name or code...

simple.info_inputs_desc: Enter numbers and use operators. Choose a GST% and tap Add GST to apply to the last number.
simple.info_calculated_fields_desc: GST table shows per-item amount, GST %, GST amount and total with GST. Grand totals aggregate all rows.

loan.title: Loan Calculator
loan.prepayment_enable_info: Enable prepayments to simulate partial payments.
loan.prepayment_validation: Fix errors: Remove duplicate months and enter amounts for each month.
loan.prepayment_amount_cap_helper: Amount cannot be greater than principal or ₹100 crore.
loan.prepayment_fix_errors_toast: Fix errors in prepayments before saving.
loan.moratorium_validation: Should not exceed total loan term.
loan.total_payment_info: The total payment includes the processing fee mentioned above.
loan.helper_notes: Note: Reducing balance loans calculate interest on the remaining principal; fixed interest loans use simple interest throughout the term.
loan.error_principal_positive: Please enter a loan amount greater than 0.
loan.error_rate_positive: Please enter an annual interest rate greater than 0%.
loan.error_term_positive: Please enter a loan term greater than 0.
loan.error_principal_cap: We currently support loan amounts up to ₹100 crores on this calculator.
loan.error_rate_cap: Please enter an annual interest rate up to {{rate}}%.
loan.error_term_cap: We currently support loan tenures up to {{years}} years. Please reduce the term.
loan.extras_disabled_hint: Note: For flat-interest loans and when solving for interest rate for reducing-balance loans, step-up EMIs and prepayments are disabled and not applied in the calculation.
loan.insight_interest_saved_body: By increasing your EMIs over time and/or making prepayments, you are saving {{interest}} in interest.
loan.insight_interest_saved_months: You are closing your loan about {{months}} months earlier.
loan.insight_interest_saved_title: You are saving big on interest!
